name: Water-Lock Refillable Moisturizer with Skin-Smoothing Peptides & Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is:A lightweight, silicone-free refillable moisturizer with natural peptides and hyaluronic acid for skin-smoothing, balanced hydration..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Skin Tone.Formulation:Lightweight Lotion.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free. All ingredients are derived from natural sources..What Else You Need to Know:Reduce waste with Water-Lock Moisturizer. Reuse your jar, pump, and cap. Recycle your refill pod.
ingredients: -Pomegranate Spheres: Absorb moisture to provide sustained hydration that can be locked into the skin..-Orange Blossom Peptides: Support the skin’s natural barrier to aid with water retention and hydration..-Macro Hyaluronic Acid: Absorbs moisture and provides a conditioning effect for a soft, hydrated, healthy-looking glow... Hordeum Vulgare Leaf Juice*, Octyldodecanol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Glycerin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Diglycerin, Sclerotium Gum, Punica Granatum Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Saccharide Isomerate, Beta Vulgaris/Beet Root Extract/Extrait de Racine de Betterave, Arnica Montana (Arnica) Extract*, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Leaf Extract*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract*, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract*, Spiraea Ulmaria (Meadowsweet) Extract*, Sambucus Nigra Fruit Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Oil*, Arachidyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Phytate, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Behenyl Alcohol, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Arachidyl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, L (+) Lactic Acid, Phenethyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Limonene, Citral, Citronellol, Linalool......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Massage 1 to 2 pumps onto face and neck. Use AM & PM...When you run out, get the refill pod...SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards...ASSEMBLY.This starter kit includes a refill pod that locks into your refillable jar. Peel off the foil, then assemble immediately. DO NOT TOUCH THE PRODUCT TO AVOID CONTAMINATION. .1. Peel the foil off of the pod. .2. Twist the pump onto the pod. .3. Drop it into the jar and twist on. ..Our caps and pumps are made from mixed materials.  Unfortunately, they are not recyclable due to their size and  composition. .Our jars are made from styrene acrylonitrile (SAN).  Unfortunately, the jars are not recyclable due to its composition. .Our refill cups are made from polyethylene and polypropylene.  Just rinse it out and toss it in your recycling bin. .Our refill foil seals are made from aluminum. Just rinse it off and  toss it in your recycling bin. .Our cartons are made from Forest Stewardship Council certified  paperboard. Just breakdown the box and toss it in your  recycling bin. .Our leaflets are made from paper. Just toss it in your recycling  bin.

reviews.review_title: Made my skin prone to aknes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t like it at all. Don’t even know why I purchased it. Not worth the money. It clogged my skin and has a distinguish smell that I don’t like.

reviews.review_title: Give it a try even if gel is not your favorite!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So.... I kind of hate gel moisturizers - I'm over 40 and my skin always leans on the dryer side nowadays, HOWEVER I told myself I'd give this particular moisturizer a shot and I'm glad I did. I'll start off by saying the first couple of uses I wasn't quite sure if I'd keep using it. The gel didn't feel as creamy as I'd like but I did LOVE The orange/pomegranate experience which made me really enjoying applying it morning and night - Since it is a gel the first couple of uses felt a little tacky but as I kept using it I noticed my skin felt bouncier - looked plump and hydrated and as I knew its chocked full of peptides I knew my skin was getting some much needed antiaging love as well. Tata Harpers products all work so beautifully when used together and when I used the resurfacing serum and the oil cleanser I noticed the gel formula moisturizer was really sealing in all that moisture and those great ingredients and I've since started using it as my staple moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thrilled to share my experience with the Tata Harper Water-Lock Refillable Moisturizer! As someone with dry, sensitive skin, I'm always on the lookout for a moisturizer that provides long-lasting hydration without clogging pores or irritating my skin.  Why I Love It: 1. *Non-Greasy Texture*: This moisturizer absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving no greasy residue or sticky feeling behind. 2. *Natural, Effective Ingredients*: Tata Harper is known for its commitment to using natural, effective ingredients, and this moisturizer is no exception. 3. *Suitable for Sensitive Skin*: I've experienced no irritation or sensitivity issues with this moisturizer, making it a great choice for those with sensitive skin. The Tata Harper Water-Lock Refillable Moisturizer is a game-changing hydrator that delivers intense moisture, smooths fine lines and wrinkles, and supports the skin's natural barrier function. With its refillable packaging and natural, effective ingredients, this moisturizer is a must-have for anyone seeking a high-performance, eco-friendly hydrator. This moisturizer is perfect for anyone seeking a hydrating, skin-smoothing moisturizer that's suitable for sensitive skin. It's also an excellent choice for those looking to reduce their beauty waste and support eco-friendly brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love nothing more than a super thick, rich moisturizer not to mention the amazing packaging this moisturizer comes in. I love this moisturizer so much and it’s amazing for my super dehydrated skin. I love a thick cream and I find this one is thick enough to hydrate without clogging my pores. I love to use this at night to really hydrate and lock in moisture after a serum or in the mornings before I apply any makeup. While it is thick it is also light weight and absorbs easily. The scent is light and has a spa vibe. The packaging is amazing and luxurious and I love the pump feature that allows for a sanitary experience. Definitely a new favorite moisturizer that I love year round. I also love that the moisturizer is from a clean brand at Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on the Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer with Skin-Smoothing Peptides & Hyaluronic Acid and love how hydrated my skin feels afterwards. As always, Tata packaging makes me feel super luxurious and excited to use the products! The moisturizer is super lightweight and does not feel greasy. In the winter months, I usually struggle hydrating my skin with any products besides super heavy creams. However, this Tata moisturizer did the trick. It really locked in the moisture after I cleanse my skin. I have also noticed my skin stop flaking with dry patches after using this moisturizer. I use this morning and night in my skincare routine and have noticed the moisturizer sits great under my makeup everyday. I've even used this as a primer on certain days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Water-Lock Refillable Moisturizer is a skincare win! Lightweight with a gel-cream texture, it glides on smoothly, absorbs fast, and leaves your skin feeling soft and hydrated. Packed with hyaluronic acid for a plump, dewy look and peptides to smooth and refine, it’s like a spa treatment in a jar. Perfect under makeup and ideal for normal to combo skin, it’s a go-to for a fresh, non-greasy finish. The refillable packaging is sleek and eco-friendly—a bonus for your routine and the planet. Subtle scent, fun design, and hydration that lasts? Yes, please!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is amongst the top 5 moisturizers that has worked well with my combination skin. It is very easy to use and apply. The moisturizer is very lightweight and does not make my skin feel greasy. I am also impressed with the texture of the moisturizer.  The packaging of it is also very nice! I would definitely be using this moisturizer and buying it again!!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful formula, but increases sun sensitivity
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper’s Water Lock Moisturizer is a multitasking hero, combining hydration and priming in one lightweight, silicone-free formula. Orange peptides and pomegranate spheres create a breathable barrier for a smooth, makeup-ready finish, while macro hyaluronic acid locks in moisture. Perfect for combating dryness and uneven texture, it simplifies your routine with its moisturizer-primer hybrid design, so no extra primer is needed when you’re applying makeup. Bonus: it’s refillable and eco-friendly! Ideal for fresh, dewy skin all day long, this product is as functional as it is luxurious.  One downside to this product is the sunburn risk. If you’re in a sunny climate or are outdoors a lot, use with sunscreen and be mindful that the AHA content may increase sun sensitivity and could result in sunburn. For that reason, I wouldn't recommend this to people in summer-like climates year round, nor would I recommend it if you're outdoors a lot. For such an expensive product, I find the limitations to wearing it a bit of a bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been applying this after cleansing my skin before my makeup routine and I definitely noticed a difference I have very dry skin in the winter time. and I definitely noticed a difference using this. My skin isn’t flaking halfway through the day and it definitely locks some moisturizer in like it says I highly recommend this to anybody with dry skin looking for a moisturizer that actually works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Tata Harper Water-lock Moisturizer for a few weeks now, and I’m loving it! As someone with dry skin, I’ve tried plenty of moisturizers, but this one really stands out. First off, it hydrates like nothing else. My skin feels so much more nourished and soft, and it doesn’t leave any greasy residue—just a smooth, plump finish. I especially love how it feels under makeup—it works almost like a primer, giving me a nice, even base without feeling heavy.  The pump-action bottle is a big plus for me too. It dispenses the perfect amount of product, so I don’t waste any. Plus, the scent is just lovely—citrusy with a hint of forest freshness, which is so calming and refreshing. It’s not overpowering, but it’s the perfect way to start or end the day. I’ve noticed my skin looks more balanced and hydrated, and I don’t have the tight, dry feeling I used to have. It’s definitely become a staple in my routine, and I’ll be repurchasing. Highly recommend if you’re looking for something that hydrates, smooths, and leaves you with a nice glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper knocks of out of the park with every product I have used. I have again, dry, flaky, dull skin that gets itchy and irritates due to being dry so finding a moisturizer that really delivers is very important to me. I really love this moisturizer and everything about it. The texture is so nice and rich but doesn’t feel greasy, it absorbs into the skin quickly and immediately leaves my skin feeling hydrated, plump, soft and soothed. It makes my face look hydrated and visibly firmer and more radiant while also priming my skin for makeup application. This product is a 2-in-1 moisturizer and primer and its performance has been great for both.  What I absolutely love about this product is not only is the jar a beautiful frosted green glass jar that you don’t have to scoop out the product, it has a pump with a hole in the center to dispense product leaving everything easy and mess free but it’s also refillable to create less waste. When you run out all you have to due is purchase the refill pod and pop it in. Like the rest of Tata Harper products the ingredients are all natural and great for your skin. It’s safe for sensitive and reactive skin as well being their aren’t harsh chemicals in the formula. These products have transformed my skin in 2 days! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper’s Water Lock Moisturizer is a total must have when it comes to hydration! It’s incredibly lightweight and gives my skin that dewy, smooth, glassy looking glow without feeling greasy or heavy basically a glass skin dream. The blend of natural peptides and hyaluronic acid locks in moisture for hours upon hours, balancing my skin’s hydration levels all day long. I love that it’s silicone free and refillable, so I’m hydrating more and wasting less (it’s giving eco-friendly vibes!). My skin feels plump, soft, and super nourished, and I’m obsessed with how fresh and hydrated I look. For some reason the green packing makes me wish this had a watermelon scent, but otherwise I really adore it. Like all of Tara’s products the packaging is also a 10:10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper’s Water-Lock Moisturizer with Skin Smoothing Peptides has become a daily essential! What I love most is how well this product works with my skin despite weather or environmental factors. It feels deeply hydrating in dry cold climates while not being too heavy for more hot and humid days. The packaging is gorgeous, in the brand’s iconic green and gold shades. Though it is plastic instead of glass, I do appreciate that it is refillable and mindful of being eco-friendly. And I absolutely love the pump, which is not only hygienic but also delivers the perfect amount. I think a little goes a long way as the product glides smoothly along the skin with or without the prior use of serum. I do tend to prefer fragrance-free moisturizers, and while this does have a noticeable scent, it’s quite pleasant if you enjoy floral and herbal smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of this moisturizer is lightweight yet creamy, blending into my skin effortlessly without leaving any residue. It locks in hydration beautifully, making my skin feel soft, plump, and comfortably smooth. I love how it absorbs quickly while still providing a dewy finish that feels fresh, not greasy. It layers perfectly under makeup, which is a must for me, and the subtle scent feels natural and calming. What I appreciate most is how it seems to balance my skin, keeping it hydrated without ever feeling heavy. It’s like a breathable cocoon of moisture that leaves my skin looking healthy and radiant every day. The pump design is both practical and hygienic, making it a top favorite for me. From texture to performance, this moisturizer checks all the boxes and delivers on what I need for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Water Lock Moisturizer is an absolute game-changer for my skin! This ultra-hydrating formula leaves my complexion feeling plump, dewy, and deeply nourished without any heaviness. The texture is light yet rich, absorbing quickly and providing instant moisture that lasts all day. I love that it's made with natural, clean ingredients, so I feel confident using it on my skin. My skin has never looked more balanced or radiant, and dry patches are a thing of the past. The packaging is elegant and functional. It’s the perfect moisturizer for anyone seeking long-lasting hydration and a healthy glow. Since using the Water Lock Moisturizer, my skin feels softer, smoother, and visibly more supple, with a noticeable improvement in its overall texture and tone. Tata Harper has truly outdone themselves with this one—I can't recommend it enough!  *This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Smooth Hydration in a single step
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer is a lightweight, silicone-free hydrator that doubles as a primer, simplifying your skincare routine. Designed to address dryness, dullness, and uneven texture, its creamy texture glides smoothly onto the skin, leaving a soft, velvety finish. With orange peptides, pomegranate spheres, and macro hyaluronic acid, it locks in hydration and smooths imperfections for a makeup-ready look. The moisturizer absorbs quickly without greasiness, making it ideal for daily use, both morning and night. The refillable pod system is eco-friendly, reflecting Tata Harper's commitment to sustainability. While it hydrates well and creates a smoothing effect, its surface-level hydration may not deeply nourish very dry skin. Additionally, the inclusion of AHAs makes sunscreen essential to prevent sun sensitivity. Overall, this hybrid product is perfect for those seeking a luxurious, multi-functional moisturizer with clean beauty credentials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice packaging and aesthetic colors, like the rest of their line. What really caught my eye was the design ontop of the lid, which was really beautiful in my opinion. It was nothing like I'd ever seen before and it gave me a better impression of the brand. The lid was a bit confusing at first because I wasn't sure whether I should twist or pop it off but after the initial confusion, I was able to remove the cap with no fuss. The dispenser is one of those push down to dispense ones, where it disbursed the product ontop of a surface after being pressed. The product can also be fully removed from it's original container and can be replaced easily. The product itself was good, really nice and light texture and creaminess. It wasn't hard to apply or blend into the skin, and it absorbed very quickly, sort of like a water based moisturizer. My skin felt soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion This Water-Lock Moisturizer is very lightweight and hydrating, this will be perfect for summer months, I prefer thicker moisturizers in winter. I like that it’s refillable, less plastic used, it has a nice dispenser, very convenient to use It hydrates instantly and it works so well like a primer under makeup.  It has a slight herbal scent like most of Tata Harper products If you like lightweight and non greasy moisturizers it’s definitely a great option

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product is been great as a day and night moisturizer and with the serum it’s perfect.  I wish that it was a little heavier to use by itself during these cold dry months. I definitely need the serum with it but it’s still perfectly hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Visibly hydrating. This moisturizer goes on very smoothly. Very convenient pump. A little goes a long way. One step for glass skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try Tara harpers water lock and it is honestly such a great addition to my skincare routine. I've been using this product for two weeks now, and the results are amazing. This moisturizer  is so luxurious and makes pampering yourself so much fun!. Made with the best ingredients, you can't go erong! The pacaging is so beautiful! Green glass that you can't help but fall in love with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super light weight, and glides on like butter. I am swooning hard over the texture and how rich it makes my skin feel. I am super impressed with how hydrated I feel right after application. My skin instantly feels relief. My skin has been so dry lately and nothing seems to help like this moisturizer. It has taken my skincare to the next level. It has a faint scent, which I quite enjoy. I’m also a huge fan of the pre portioned pump. It minimizes waste and keeps me accountable for how much product I am actually using.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite pregnancy safe moisturizer. I love the slight floral-herb scent that usually comes along with Tata Harper products, and the moisturizer is absolutely perfect for my combination skin - not greasy and it is light on the skin while hydrating. Never had a reaction to it and skin feels hydrated and plump. I also love that this is refillable - great option to save a little bit. Plus, I always get every drop out of the container!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Water Lock Moisturizer has been a game-changer in my skincare routine. From the first application, my skin felt smoother and hydrated, with a soft, velvety finish. Its lightweight formula absorbs almost instantly, leaving no greasy residue—perfect for daily use. The clean, citrusy scent is subtle and refreshing, adding a spa-like touch to my routine. The elegant packaging stands out, and the pump dispenser is genius for controlling usage and preventing waste. Packed with orange peptides and macro hyaluronic acid, it targets roughness and dryness effectively, making my skin appear brighter and more even. This moisturizer is ideal for anyone seeking a blend of luxury, sustainability, and high performance. It’s a must-have for those who want effortless hydration and smoother texture every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this moisturizer has the eco-friendly option to purchase refill packs! The single dose pump makes sure that the perfect amount is dispensed each time and avoids overuse and waste. A 2-in-1 moisturizer and primer, the texture is lightweight and silky but provides intense hydration with water-lock technology.  The semi-matte finish is perfect to prep the skin for makeup application. Hyaluronic acid, pomegranate hydrospheres and orange blossom peptides attract and lock in hydration and moisture to instantly plump the skin and fortify the barrier. Each jar contains 83 individual pumps, so it should last almost 3 months when using 1 pump each evening as a night cream!

reviews.review_title: Lightweight and easy to absorb, citrus scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying Tata Harper skin care product . Tata water-lock moisturizer comes in a glass bottle with pump dispenser on the top to keep it clean and easy to control how much you want your cream  . It’s a refillable bottle so if you like it . The main ingredients are : Pomegranate Spheres: Absorb moisture to provide sustained hydration, Orange Blossom Peptides: Support the skin’s natural barrier, Macro Hyaluronic Acid: Absorbs moisture and provides a conditioning effect. For the texture, it’s lightweight and a little runny . For the scent , it’s more like citrus , so if someone don’t like scented skin care you might consider. I feel refreshed after I applied . I dint feel oily . The only thing I consider is that it has sunburn warning because it contains AHA. It’s a little bummer for me . But if you’re looking for something like that you might consider trying .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this moisturizer by Tata Harper. Not only is this product beautifully packaged, but it has a press pump on the top for easy access and to maintain product preservation. The container is beautifully packaged with a gold lid. This product does not only look good but it smells amazing! This light weight moisturizer is a perfect fit for my combination skin. It does not feel greasy and my skin literally drinks this amazing product up! I have been using this product for 2 weeks now and my skin feels and looks amazing! My complexion and texture of my skin has noticably improved. My skin overall feels smooth and has a vibrant glow to it. I could not be more happy with this product and I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Hydration Hero with a Luxe Touch!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently added the Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer to my routine, and it’s quickly become a favorite! With my dry, fair skin, I’m always on the lookout for something hydrating but lightweight—and this checks all the boxes.  The texture is airy and absorbs beautifully, leaving my skin feeling soft and smooth without any greasiness. The peptides and hyaluronic acid work wonders to plump and hydrate, giving my face a fresh, dewy glow. I also love that it’s refillable; it feels good knowing I’m reducing waste while treating my skin to a luxury product.  The citrusy scent is light and refreshing, like a little spa moment every morning. While it’s on the pricier side, the quality and results make it worth it. If you’re looking for a moisturizer that hydrates, smooths, and cares for the planet, this is the one!

reviews.review_title: A must have for your evening skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dislike most moisturizers, which makes me very picky. I have combination skin and they always leave me either looking too oily or not hydrated enough. However, this Tata Harper Water-Lock Refillable Moisturizer with Skin-Smoothing Peptides & Hyaluronic Acid is actually perfect. It's thick enough, especially for the winter months and to use at night time, without leaving me to wake up looking like a grease ball. There is no overwhelming fragrance and the push tab packaging makes it easy to disperse the product in a hygienic and mindful way. The packaging itself is luxurious of course with a hefty container that looks appealing on your counter top. I've noticed that my skin in particular sucks this moisturizer right up and I can go to sleep without worrying about drenching my pillow in moisturizer. It's a win, win, win in my book.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Water-Lock Moisturizer from Tata Harper is one of the most interesting textures for a cream -- it's thick, but MY GOODNESS ... does it soften into one of the most beautiful water-based formulas you'll probably ever encounter. But, there is one problem. For someone in their mid-20s with unpredictably reactive skin, this worked well upon first application! My combination skin was well-balanced with the oilier areas still not feeling greasy. However, the scent is definitely something to get used to. It's earthiness, which also leans floral, is very fragrant. While I LOVED the scent at first, it was a little TOO strong (especially within the first few minutes of application). But, if you LOVE fragrance in skincare, this could easily be a 5-star moisturizer for you! And, who doesn't love the fact that it's refillable WITH a 'push' top?! Still, a total win in my book!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer comes in a sleek green jar with a refillable pod system reflecting it’s eco-conscious trait. It has a gel cream texture that quickly absorbs into the skin without feeling heavy or greasy. The moisturizer has natural subtle aroma with citrus notes that gives a fresh feeling. It has beneficial ingredients like hyaluronic acid that provides plumping skin and protects skin’s natural barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OK, what why are all these Tata Harper products so freaking amazing I have never seen such results from any other ground and I will continue to buy this until it discontinues if it ever does. This is amazing in the desert climate and has been extremely kind of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the first Tata Harper products I have ever tried, and I am absolutely obsessed! This moisturizer is perfect for my skin (oily/combo). I love how it does not leave me feeling oily or greasy. I love using this right after I apply the resurfacing serum. This moisturizer is not too heavy to use during the day, and I usually apply it after my vitamin C serum and before my sunscreen. There is also no peeling of my makeup when I use this moisturizer which is a major plus! I noticed that my skin does not peel during the winter months, where my skin gets a bit dry around my nose area. Also, I absolutely am obsessed that the packaging is refillable! Not only is this brand organic, but also very eco-friendly. I will definitely be repurchasing the refill once it is done!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice moisturizer, but I don't love it. It is thick so I don't use it every day. As a matter of fact, the pump doesn't work, I'm assuming because of the thickness. I also don't love the smell. It has a beautiful citrus smell, at first, but then the back end is odd. It is subtle, so if your nose is just average, you won't notice it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer I’ve ever tried from Tata Harper! This is such a gorgeous product that has kept my skin so soothed and hydrated. I absolutely adore the clean ingredients and how well this works with my skin! The packaging is also amazing and love the pump!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Water-Lock Refillable Moisturizer with these ingredients sounds wonderfully moisturizing so I decided to put it to the test for the start of this fall season and I really have 3 favorite features and one that I'm not completely convinced by. To start with, the packaging is beautiful, useful and I love the dispenser because it gives me the perfect amount of use. The second thing is that, this has a very interesting and creamy texture and the third is the deep hydration sensation that I have been able to feel. Another good aspect is that it can be used in both day and night routine. However about the unfavorable aspect in my personal opinion, it is the very, very strong smell that this cream has. In fact, I cannot distinguish a specific smell and it is certainly not a chemical smell but I am very sensitive to skincare with fragrances so I like to be honest. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and it's been hard for me to find a moisturizer that works well for me.  This one sinks in well so it doesn't feel sticky on my pillow, but to my amazement, when I wake up the next morning my skin still feels hydrated and moisturized!!!  This is a BIG deal for me.  The hydration is long lasting and feels like I'm doing something good for my skin.  After using it for a few weeks, my skin is plumper, glowier, and feels well hydrated every day instead of drying out by the end of the day.    In addition to all the things I love about how this moisturizer feels and makes my skin look, I also love the packaging.  It looks very elegant sitting on my vanity so I feel fancy using it, but on top of that, it's got the reusable packaging and the airless pump.  I'm a big fan of the airless pump for sanitary purposes and I feel like reusable packaging should be standard by now.  Hat's off to you Tata Harper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

This moisturizer is in an airless pump and you have to push down to dispense.  I like this mechanism and it’s easy to use each time.    I do find that it’s better to use the moisturizer with the serum and not alone.  It feels more moisturizing after using the serum.    Tata Harper is a clean beauty brand and I liked using this moisturizer with the serum and refining cleanser.    I find that the moisturizer is hydrating and soothing for my skin and I enjoyed it overall.  I do recommend it!  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Light-weight and keeps my skin moisturized all day

reviews.review_text: My skin does look brighter, plumper, and is left feeling hydrated and protected right after application. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

Since using this product, my acne and blemishes have started to calm down, and my complexion has become brighter and more even-toned. If you’re looking for a moisturizer that addresses dry skin, texture issues, and anti-aging, I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am thirty year old with combination ski . This is now the third product I have used from Tara Harper . reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: (This review was collected as part of a promotion) I had the pleasure of trying the Water Lock Moisturizer, and following my positive experiences with other Tata Harper products, this one was no different. The added benefits of the peptides made my skin feel hydrated and bouncy. If you combine the referencing serum and the water lock moisturizer, they will work wonders for your skin. Do yourself a favor and pick up this moisturizer if you suffer from dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin so I've tried dozens and dozens of moisturizers to try to quench the thirst of my skin. This one would rank in my top 5. It's very moisturizing! my skin feels *dramatically* more moisturized whenever I wake up than most moisturizers I've used. It is VERY effective. It goes on smoothly and the dispenser is nice because it means I don't contaminate the remainder of the product with my fingers. I kind of hate to say this but the scent is also extremely nice. I hate that I enjoy the scent because I avoid fragranced skincare like the plague normally! Luckily my skin has not reacted negatively to it. The fragrance, the plastic jar (why not glass?) and the fact that my dispenser is wonky and stops working randomly are all reasons why it's lower in my moisturizer ranking and why I only give it 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper's Water-Lock Refillable Moisturizer is a luxurious skincare treat designed to deliver intense hydration and enhance skin texture. Infused with skin-smoothing peptides and hyaluronic acid, this lightweight cream absorbs quickly, leaving the skin plump and dewy without any greasy residue. After consistent use, I noticed improved elasticity and a more radiant complexion. Ideal for all skin types, this moisturizer effectively combats dryness and enhances overall skin health, making it a must-have in any skincare routine. Highly recommended for those seeking hydration and a smooth finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a good moisturizer. Particularly for those with dry to combination skin. However, the packaging fell short for me. Holding it felt like it was cheaply designed. It was also a bit bulky to open. The only redeeming quality of the packaging was the pump/dispensing system that only removes the amount of product needed keeping the rest protected. Considering that Tata Harper is a luxury brand and the price of this moisturizer, I expected the packaging to match that experience. It did not. However, the actual moisturizer was quite nice. It does have the classic Tata Harper fragrance, but it was overall mild and did not bother my skin at all. It was on the thicker side, which is great for my dry skin. I feel like it was able to fully absorb over night and gave me lasting hydration for the next 24 hours. If Tata Harper fixes the package design, this would be a winner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the main issues with my skin is dryness, and for years I've been searching for the best moisturizer to alleviate this problem. Recently, I had the chance to try Tata Harper's Hydratant Profond Water-Lock, and from the first application, I noticed it has a rich, creamy texture. It absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling fresh and hydrated. What really stands out is how my complexion looks: radiant, smooth, and ready for my daily makeup application. I also love the presence of natural ingredients in its formula and the subtle scent of orange extract. I've been using this product alongside the refining cleanser and the Resurfacing Serum for two weeks, and I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture and hydration. I definitely recommend this complete set. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Got rid of my dry oatches
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use tretinoin and i have dry patches on my skin in the morning. I tried several moisturizers but nothing helped. Finally i tried the tata harper water lock moisturizer after my tretinoin and i did not see any dry patches on my face. Amazing moisturizer and lightweight too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of the moisturizer is really silky. It's creamy rather than gel, but it's light enough to soak in completely. It spreads really nicely and doesn't take much to cover your whole face. Unfortunately, beyond having a nice texture initially I am not a fan. Keep in mind that I have combo leaning dry, very acne prone, textured skin. The positives: I haven't been using too long but it does seem to help to lighten my post-acne hyperpigmentation. It soaks in nicely and if used in the morning doesn't leave my face shiny or greasy. The cons: I tried using it at night because of the AHA concerns I'll mention below and I woke up with my skin significantly drier and flakier than it was before. It hasn't helped my texture at all and I think I might have more little bumps than I did before I started using; at minimum no improvement. Some possible concerns for others: it's pretty scented. It smells like a mix of herbal grasses and orange zest but it lasts even on the skin long after the moisturizer has soaked in and dried. It also contains some ingredients that I know some people find clog pores like olive oil, although it is silicone free as a plus. It has a lot of ingredients and while they're very natural that might be of extra concern if you have allergies, and some of them aren't labeled with the common name (barley isn't noted while most of the others have the common name listed). The refill isn't much cheaper than the original jar.  It concerns me that it's a moisturizer meant to be used daily or even twice a day but it has AHAs. It has a warning about sun exposure, but also should probably warn about combining with other actives. I worry that using it everyday like a normal moisturizer would damage my skin barrier from the AHA. It does feel like a gentler exfoliating option which I like but I really think the warning should be much bigger: you NEED sunscreen with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Water Lock Moisturizer by Tata Harper has become a favorite hydrator for both morning and night. As someone with combination skin that can get dry in some areas and oily in others, finding a lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer that actually hydrates without clogging pores is a hard find. This formula is incredibly refreshing, it’s light, yet it leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated for hours. Plus, it smooths out my skin, making it perfect to use under makeup. It’s basically like a primer and moisturizer in one, so I love that I can skip a step in the morning.  The best part is how breathable it feels. I don’t get that heavy, sticky feeling that some moisturizers leave behind, and my skin stays fresh and dewy throughout the day. I’ve noticed a real improvement in my skin’s texture and overall appearance since I started using it, and the fact that it’s silicone-free makes it even better. If you’re looking for a moisturizer that hydrates, smooths, and primes without weighing you down, this one is definitely worth adding to your routine! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this moisturizer.  The first thing I noticed is that the container is environmentally friendly with a refillable pod.  Once you need a refill, the pod is $6 cheaper, so it’s friendlier to your wallet too! When you push down on the product, you only need one pump to dispense the perfect amount for your entire face.  A benefit is that this is more hygienic, so you’re not digging your fingers and nails into an entire jar to get the moisturizer out.  It glides on the face with ease, and has a pleasant, citrus aroma that quickly dissipates. It felt very luxurious as I applied it.  It is very gentle, and I didn’t experience any sensitivity.  My face stayed hydrated all day and makeup went on easily, as this acts as a makeup primer as well.  When applied in the evening, my face stayed hydrated all night.  This can be used in any season, as it quickly absorbs into the skin no matter the weather.  Overall, a really nice moisturizer that I enjoy using!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: This is the mother of all moisturizers

reviews.review_text: With a light wildflower and citrus scent, Tata Harper water lock moisturizer is one smooth product. It instantly hydrated my dehydrated skin. With 19 high-performance and gradient dermal logic tested 1 to 2 pumps onto face and neck in the a.m. and p.m. is all you need. One of the best parts is that it’s a refillable pod.  So there’s less waste.  This is an all in one step hydrator that also helps lock in make up and believe it or not ask as a primer. There are not many moisturizers out there that do that. It was also immediately soothing and my skin barrier felt healthier and plumper. It kind of goes on like a water gel hydrating but not too slick. so this moisturizer is definitely great for the dehydrated, skin people or combination skin alike. Even skin types could benefit from this formula. It truly locks in the moisturizer for all day wear. I would highly recommend anybody trying this moisturizer above all. Also to all make up artists as this Tata Harper moisturizer works as a gripper for flawless foundation. I think by one use you will be amazed like I was and still am.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Tata Harper Waterlock Moisturizer, and it's quickly become an essential part of my skincare routine. It's perfect for both AM and PM use, but because it contains AHAs, I always pair it with sunscreen in the mornings to protect my skin from sun sensitivity. Despite my skin's usual sensitivity to the sun, I've had no issues as long as I stick to my SPF routine. If you want something to hydrate, smooth, and prime in one step, I highly recommend Tata Harper Waterlock Moisturizer. It's an easy, effective solution that makes my skin look and feel great all day!   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. Really wanted to like this moisturizer, but it’s just okay in my book. First pro right away was the pump dispenser, which keeps the product clean and hygienic. I also really like the scent! The orange blossom provides a freshness which pairs well with Tata’s earthiness. But it is a bit on the stronger side, so this may not be the best scent for those who are sensitive. The biggest con for me was that the product doesn’t clearly state that it contains lactic acid. Normally I like including acids in my routine, but this time I really just wanted a product that was hydrating with hyaluronic acid and nourishing with peptides. I used it on a damaged barrier (without knowing it contained lactic acid) and it stung pretty bad. I did notice the AHA warning on the box later on, so I guess this is more user error, but again the active ingredients should be clearly labeled. I also found the texture a little on the oily side which is not my preferred consistency. It’s not a product I would use daily because of the heavy texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer has become a staple in my skincare routine, especially with my super sensitive skin. What I love most about the Water-Lock Moisturizer is its innovative water-locking technology. It provides long-lasting hydration without feeling greasy or heavy. My skin feels soft, plump, and well-moisturized throughout the day. It also has a smooth, almost gel-like texture that absorbs quickly, making it perfect for layering under makeup. Since using this moisturizer, I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's hydration levels and overall texture. There's no irritation or redness, just smooth, healthy-looking skin. Plus, the subtle, natural scent is refreshing and not overpowering. If you have sensitive skin and are looking for a moisturizer that delivers deep hydration and a comfortable wear, I highly recommend the Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer. It's a game-changer for keeping my skin balanced and nourished.

I face some critical challenges, dry skin and eczema among them, and I am happy to report this beautiful cream not only helped the dryness but did not affect my eczema at all, which is always a risk with a scented product.  This moisturizer looks and feels like luxury. The packaging is stunning. It reminds me of something my grandmother would have kept on her vanity, and it brought a real feeling of nostalgia.  It seamlessly combines that classic vintage style with newer, more modern technology within that helps repair and heal our skin while helping build that ever-important barrier. It also has a fabulous fresh and creamy citrus scent I adore.  It applies smoothly to the skin, absorbing quickly and leaving behind no residue. I was in love with how it felt. It felt refreshing on my skin the moment I applied it. More so, I was impressed that the claim of not needing a primer for your makeup held true. I did not need a primer after applying this. My skin looked refreshed and hydrated. I felt better. My skin felt relieved. With it being summer my skin is dryer than ever, and it really needed a drink of thirst-quenching moisture and it found it. This lightweight moisturizer primes and hydrates the skin with orange peptides, pomegranate spheres, and macro hyaluronic acid.  The Tata Harper Water Lock Moisturizer is great for people with roughness/uneven texture, dry skin, or skin that is dull.  I really loved the design of the 1.7 oz reusable jar that was super eco friendly coming with a refillable pod. You only need a couple of pumps and a little bit goes a long way! I do advise this product may not be for people who have very ultra sensitive skin because this moisturizer contains lactic acid or alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) which helps with skin cell turnover or helping smooth rough skin texture but can increase sunburn sensitivity. So, this product may sting for some people. I highly recommend wearing sunscreen also with this moisturizer or avoiding direct sunlight or uv rays.  My personal experience with the Tata Harper Water Lock Moisturizer is that I didn’t notice immediate positive results with this moisturizer. I was disappointed in this moisturizer. At times, it left my skin a little dry and tight instead of my skin locked in with deep hydration. I have been using the Tata Harper Water Lock Moisturizer along with the Tata Harper clarifying cleanser.  I think this moisturizer is still great for people with are looking to smooth rough textured skin but don’t have sensitive skin. reviews.review_text: Let me preface this by saying I'm an esthetician. I bought this after a recent facial to try it because I've always liked the texture and the scent, felt like a perfect summer cream. I WAS WRONG. I get home and look at the box and there is a sunburn warning on the side. I check the ingredients and see lactic acid. Ugh! I am so sick of brands doing this. There is NO reason that a daily use product that is left on (serum or cream) should have an AHA or BHA in it, absolutely no reason. A cleanser, fine. A product for use once or twice a week, sure. But a daily moisturizer? Absolutely not. This will hurt your barrier. I don't care if it's called water lock or that it contains peptides. They ruined it with that AHA. They likely included it because it gives an immediate glow, but I strongly do not recommend this bc of that lactic acid. Otherwise it would have been a win for combo skin in a humid climate in the summer. Tata Harper fail.

reviews.review_text: this moisturizer feels so luxurious and clean on my skin. I have been struggling with eczema and adult acne and needed some hydration boost. My skin feels so revitalized and absolutely love it! This was complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this eco friendly design.  The moisturizer comes in a reusable container that you can switch out and therefore save plastic waste.  I like that it has a citrus scent and that it is a clean beauty product.  This is gifted by Tata Harper skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super moisturizing cream and has definitely kept my skin hydrated. I love the refill packaging concept for less waste and the pump is awesome to keep things a more hygienic as well. Gifted by Tata Harper Skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review. To start I will say this is a beautiful jar. The green Tata Harper packaging is stunning, I love the pump so it is hygienic, and I love that it is refillable in a non complicated way. The moisturizer itself works extremely well. I like the slight citrus natural scent to it and it does an amazing job as my night moisturizer. This claims to have water locking technology for the outermost layers of skin. Idk how that works really, but my skin is very supple while using this and I love the way it appears. I wish the refill was more affordable and then I would definitely repurchase, but this is a luxury brand of course. It appears to be worth it!

reviews.review_title: This is such a natural and gentle moisturizer, and
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a natural and gentle moisturizer, and it leaves my skin feeling so soft, calm, and hydrated. I think the packaging is brilliant too, I love that with the refill system it helps keep plastics out of the landfill, there’s nothing I don’t love about this Water-Lock Moisturizer, it’s a total dream for my dry skin type! I received this complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I love that the cap and pump are reusable. It goes on really nicely and absorbs into your skin without any greasy or oily residue. It feels so luxurious and works amazingly! I’m blown away!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is everything I’ve ever wanted in a moisturizer and more! I love that it doesn’t contain silicones, which always break my sensitive skin out, and it works beautifully under makeup—it almost has a primer like effect & really smooths my skin making the perfect base for foundation. This is such a natural and gentle moisturizer, and it leaves my skin feeling so soft, calm, and hydrated. I think the packaging is brilliant too, I love that with the refill system it helps keep plastics out of the landfill, there’s nothing I don’t love about this Water-Lock Moisturizer, it’s a total dream for my dry skin type! I received this complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this moisturizer! It feels so smooth on the skin and underneath makeup. It really provides a wonderful base for makeup, especially the cream products I use in the summer. I have dry skin and the moisturizer provides an ample amount of hydration. My favorite part is that this is refillable, so I can just pop in the little pod every time I’m done! Gifted by Tara Harper Skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is absolutely amazing! I received this moisturized gifted by Tata Harper Skincare to try out and review, and it has exceeded all expectations! It blends so smoothly into my skin, and isn't heavy or sticky! It's a great moisturizer that honestly don't a lot of good for my skin! You need to try this out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review. This moisturizer works well on my sensitive and combo skin! It successfully hydrates my skin without leaving that awful tacky feeling. I love that this product allows you to easily reuse the packaging, and that the moisturizer doesn't contain a bunch of crappy ingredients in it. This product is amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Tara Harper Skincare for review. I prefer moisturizers free of silicone like this formula, and I love how lightweight this feels and how smooth it is to apply without feeling sticky. It absorbs into my skin quickly and makeup applied on top has a flawless finish without caking or pilling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how hydrating this moisturizer is and it’s perfect for both day time and night time. I have dry skin so this really provides the moisture I need. It is also just feels very luxurious to apply. Gifted by Tara Harper Skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! It was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. It really does lock in moisture all day and has my skin feeling so smooth and soft. Love that this product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free. Love that all of the ingredients are derived from natural sources. Love that this product is great for all skins types. This product is also lightweight . Would highly recommend this product .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The name of this product says it all. It really does lock in moisture all day. Makes my face look radiant from within and it lasts all day. Generally mid day my skin starts to get tight and not look hydrated but this lasts all day and into the next morning. Gifted by Tata Harper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/ sensitive skin and have really been enjoying this moisturizer, especially now that it is so hot and humid where I live! My favorite part has to be the pump packaging and the fact that it’s refillable. Gifted by Tata Harper skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this moisturizer gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. It’s really lightweight and doesn’t leave my skin oily or greasy. I also love that it’s clean and it doesn’t clog my pores. I have combination skin and I find this works well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing but left a weird film. The scent was also a little too citrusy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is so hydrating and refreshing. It completely nourishes the skin and is extremely long lasting. I highly recommend this moisturizer for those who enjoy a dreamy dewy like finish. So amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I have combination skin and my skin is smoother. I like wearing it under makeup because it keeps my skin hydrated. I like that it feels lightweight on my skin. I love that it absorbs quickly. It has a wonderful scent. It smells like oranges, but it is not overpowering. I love the packaging because it has a recyclable refill pod. I recommend it! This was gifted by Tata Harper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin too oily. Great packaging and nice gentle scent. I was worried about the dispensed but it works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pills like crazy. Also nothing special. Wish I had returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This review does not cover product performance, just my very first impressions upon opening the box.  Just noting that 1) this cream contains AHAs, which is not noted as a featured ingredient so you may just want to keep that in mind in case you already have an AHA in your routine—I’m going to have to adjust my routine since I wasn’t expecting those; 2) the packaging is plastic and not glass.  I love the Tata Harper glass packaging and that was honestly part of why I invested in this cream, disappointed to see it is plastic.  Right now I am not recommending this cream but that could change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! It’s so light but definitely powerful! I love how firming it is! I have super dry skin especially around my chin and this keeps me super moisturized all day. The dispenser is also amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Heard many good things on the TaTa Brand, decided to start off with the water lock moisturizer. I’m super impressed by it! I love the texture of this moisturizer. It instantly absorbs into my skin, provides immediate hydration. Makes my skin soft. It’s got a lovely light scent to it, which doesn’t bother me. Gonna try one of their serums next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this moisturizer, but it wasn’t for me. I feel like it just saturates my pores and makes me break out. It feels heavy on my skin. I think I’ll switch back to the Tatcha Water Cream. It smells amazing, and it might work better on someone with dryer skin or tighter pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how light this feels on my skin! I have sensitive, acne prone skin so I’m always cautious because most moisturizers break me out. But not this one! I love the light almost citrus scent it has too. This one is a winner.

reviews.review_title: Super nourishing. Like food for skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The most nourishing skin benefitting moisturizer. Its actually quite light, so I mix in argan oil or a thicker miosturizer in the winter. I really love this. Its like food for my skin. No silicones so it fully absorbs. Makes my skin look very plump, hydrated, nourished, and healthy. The packaging is not great, but its the best moisturizer so doesnt matter lol

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it...but the cream pills on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product for many reasons. **I wish more brands offered a refillable concept to reduce packaging waste.** The price isn't bad either. BUT, everytime I used this product, the cream was pilling on my skin (I have not come near finishing mine for this reason). I tried using it here and there in between creams and it always pills. The more serum you use the more it will pill also. My skin is too dry to go without serum but using a generous amount of cream alone will also pill. (I gave 2 stars for being green, refillable, packaging + pump dispenser)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. My skin feeling so hydrated and plumped. I used a gift card for this purchase because I was hesitant.  Well worth the $$$$ My skin is a combination between oily and dry.  This works!! The smell is strong but goes away after a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Tata’s water lock moisturizer for a little over 2 months, let me first preface by saying I have very normal skin with no major issues except for some breakouts here and there. My skin is left glowing and even after every use and I’m absolutely addicted! I find the smell pleasant very citrusy and fresh. The packaging has not given me problems yet but based on reviews that may change. I would recommend this for normal/oily as well as sensitive skin if you have very dry skin I would look elsewhere while this does give my skin a plump dewy feeling it’s not the most moisturizing product I’ve used. But since I don’t struggle with dry skin this is definitely not a deal breaker for me! Overall worth the price tag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it and it had about 30% of the creme missing. This product is not cheap and it looks like by other pictures the same thing is happening, so this wasn’t a one off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer is good, although perhaps it’s too fragrant but the main problem is the pump mechanism that the refill comes in: stops functioning after about two months. I bought this because I wanted to get something eco friendly and less wasteful plus I’m pregnant.  The aggravation it caused makes it almost not worth it. Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne-prone skin. I've used this moisturizer consistently for a month now and I love it. My skin hasn't broken out and it doesn't make my skin feel greasy. The moisturizer works perfectly underneath my makeup. I have had no issues with the pump. It's a bit tricky pumping out the correct amount but, feasible. The smell isn't pleasant but, tolerable since I am not sensitive to scents. I plan on re-purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells weird. I'm not picking up an orange scent at all. But I was willing to deal with the smell if the product worked well. The light consistency was promising; it went on smoothly. After a few minutes it was clear that the product wasn't absorbing into my skin. When it finally dried my skin felt dry and tight. I really wanted to like this but it's going back. Great packaging, though...more skin care companies should consider doing the same thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the lotion itself but the packaging design is terrible.  When I used the starter package everything worked fine.  I emptied out the original bottle and the pump got stuck.  Now the pump will not work on the refill package.  I will not be repurchasing.  I wasted so much product trying to fix the pump, it’s just not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. The water lock moisturizer is amazing on my combination skin and I love the reusable jar and pump. After using this moisturizer I noticed my skin feels smooth and stays hydrated under my makeup. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received my water-lock moisturizer complimentary from Tara Harper skincare in exchange for my honest opinion. Overall, I was happy with this moisturizer! Some people disliked the strong scent, but I thought it was light with a distinct orange fragrance. It was not unpleasant or overwhelming to me. My skin did feel much more moisturized after using, and I found the formula to be creamy yet lightweight upon application. However, I didn’t really noticing much of a skin smoothing effect, which I was really hoping for. If there was any, it was minimal. It’s a good moisturizer, but I wasn’t left feeling blown away by it. The packaging, on the other hand, is pretty perfect. I love the design and think the packaging is beautiful and feels quality. I also really like that once you have the pump, you only need to purchase pod refills, reducing plastic waste since you’re reusing the pump!

reviews.review_title: Great packaging and even better product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review.  I love everything about the packaging of this container—not only can it be reused, but the pump on the top is so innovative! I use 1 pump of this after cleansing in the morning, and that is more than enough. This moisturizer is so light weight and feels amazing on my skin. It also smells heavenly! My skin feels so soft and doesn’t feel weighed down or greasy at all. I will definitely continue using this amazing moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Tata harper this new formula I definitely recommend for those who were sensitive around the eyes or certain areas. I enjoy clean beauty ingredients and this was definitely one of them! I have dry skin this has definitely come in hand with my skin. I like that this has a film therefore its not exposed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This complimentary Tata Harper Skincare felt amazing on my skin. I have combination skin sometimes leaning more towards the oily side. My skin felt smoother especially after a few days of use. Wearing makeup felt fresher with this product. So this will definitely be in my daily routine.

reviews.review_title: Works well for my winter skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

The smells is nice and I can definitely see how supple my skin feels after the application of this mosturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The scent is pleasant and refreshing. I love the reusable container system and the pump that reduces contamination of the cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly great packaging and can refill it. I have combination skin.. The texture of the cream is rich and perfect that skin needs. I saw difference in my skin. Smell is very mild and refreshing. Quantity is also good enough. Gifted by Tata Harper Skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper Skincare gifted me this product for review purposes.  Thank you so much to Tata Harper Skincare for this absolutely amazing moisturizer.
