I would highly recommend this product to others who are looking for a high end skincare company with effective products. Also I really loved the refill jar that it comes with that's extremely nice and I will most definitely utilize that feature.   Thank you again for the gift Tata Harper Skincare! Highly recommend this product to others. 5+stars from this girl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper and I am so happy I did! Not only does this moisturizer help soothe my dry skin, but I also really love the sustainable refill system. My skin also felt so smooth and when applying makeup afterward, it looked perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to receive this moisturizer to try, and upon getting it, I fell in love with almost everything about it, down to the packaging! This is definitely what I think of when I think of a “luxury” moisturizer. The moisturizer itself comes with a refillable pump tub which is amazing to keep the product inside from getting contaminated, and the fact that it’s more sustainable is awesome! I’m not a huge fan of fragrance but this one does smell absolutely amazing as well. The moisturizer absorbs super quickly and leaves my skin looking amazing. This is definitely working it’s way into my top 3 moisturizers of all time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I have been loving this moisturizer. It definitely locks in moisture and leaves your skin feeling plumed while also being lightweight, and breathable. It non greasy and doesn’t leave any residue. It’s perfect on its own or under makeup. This has a light citrus scent but still worked for my sensitive skin and didn’t cause me an breakouts. My only con for this would be the price point, but it’s honestly a lovely product and super sustainable with its refillable packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is complimentary gifted by Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review. I have really oily skin & I've been using since for some time now,  I use it under my make up or even without it too. It primes my skin so well. As well as it keeps my skin less oily. But I felt like it should last longer on my skin, I dont know may be it evaporates or something, but its good and smooth for 3 to 4 hours max After that my skin starts to feel even more oily & greasier then every. For a shorter term, is best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this facial lotion. It’s not too heavy and not too light. My skin is combo and it’s perfect. I love that it is silicone free! I use this morning and night since I’ve received it. It makes my skin feel amazingly soft and supple. I received this complimentary from Tara Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_title: Hydrating and good for the environment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer! It left my skin feeling hydrated but not greasy. I have combination skin and this didn’t make me break out either. This was my first time using a press down dispenser like this, it was very easy to use and setup. I love that this is refillable and helping to take steps to make skincare more sustainable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I have dry skin and this product really helps. My skin feels smooth and hydrated most of the day. Tata did a great job with the packaging with the refill option. I also find the press-down delivery convenient as it gives me exactly the right amount of moisturizer every time.  Extra points for the light, discreet fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Love the cream and the packaging!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second Tata Harper product and I absolutely love it! The cream has a light scent and is very hydrating. It doesn’t leave my oily skin feeling greasy and absorbs quickly. I LOVE the refillable container it comes in! It’s my first time using anything in a container like that. It was easy to set up and I just love that I don’t have to dip my finger into the cream, which to me is more hygienic! It dispenses just enough product and wipes clean! I’ve been applying the cream every morning and night after my serum and it leaves my skin feeling so smooth and hydrated! So happy I discovered Tata Harper products because I’m now hooked!   I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper in exchange for my honest feedback!

I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. First off, the packaging was the most amazing I’ve ever seen for any product! The product itself left my skin feeling hydrated and silky smooth. I didn’t love the scent but it’s not too overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really excited to use this amazing light weight and fast absorbing moisturizer. It has a mild fragrance and makes skin really soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely recommend this product. It’s lightweight and still a little bit goes a long way. I love using this at night but I also find it wears very under makeup — all seasons! Doesn’t have a strong scent so you don’t have to worry about that and it absorbs into the skin so quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin so I like moisturizers that feel light. This has a nice texture to it and it applies really smoothly to the face. My face and skin ends up feeling hydrated and nice. It works as a great base for makeup and foundation goes on great since my chin has some dry patches but the moisturizer helps me a lot. I received this complimentary from Tara Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is very lightweight and I love that it layers cleanly. The refillable system is pretty unique and I enjoyed that aspect as well. I have normal to dry skin type and this provided me with ample hydration. Another good one from Tata Harper! I received this complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare but thoughts are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Tata Harper Water Lock Moisturizer. I have combination skin. I like using this am/pm and under my makeup. My skin looks very moisturized and smoother and plumper. It doesn’t feel greasy or heavy at all. It has a light herbal orange fragrance. I love that you can buy refillable pods for the packaging. I like how it uses a pump and you never touch the actual cream so it doesn’t get contaminated. I was gifted by Tata Harper in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from Tata Harper. I have combination skin that dries out more in the colder weather. This moisturizer has been perfect for my morning routine. It looks in the moisture and makes my skin feel so soft and smooth. My makeup looks great and my skin feels fresh all day long. The packaging is also nice and I really like the refillable pod!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing moisturizer. I have oily combinations skin. It hydrates and plumps my skin with all the moisture with out making it look oily orgreasy. It soaks into the skin giving fresh look. Gifted by tata harper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think it's smart and helpful for the environment that they sell refills so there's less plastic waste. I'm disappointed that alcohol and skin sensitizing fragrance ingredients at the bottom of the list basically ruined this product for me. If they just got rid of those bad ingredients, then this would be a great yet expensive moisturizer. This was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is gifted by Tata Harper, tata harper water lock moisturizer is super hydrating and refreshing The smell it's awesome, knowing its all natural ingredients and benefiting my skin. The moisturizer is hydrating and easily absorbed into your skin. Water Lock moisturizer with a light floral herbal scent keeps my skin feeling moist all day long. Well absorbed, easy to apply. Just two pumps it's enough. The skin looks smoother, wrinkles are less visible, pores are smaller. The skin really looks great, fresher and healthier. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tata products, it is quite an experience to use it, my skin feels moisturized after using it and it is very light, my skin is combo and I like how my makeup looks, the sustainable refill system is a plus, very happy with this product.This was gifted by Tata Harper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. The Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer has a pleasant creamy texture, the cream is easily distributed over the skin, is well absorbed, perfectly combines with other cosmetics, does not roll off and causes some problems.  I recommend this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review. This absorbed into my skin rather quickly, was non sticky and gave me a youthful, dewy look. I didn't even realize that this product had AHA's in it until I looked it up sometime afterwards. It is very gentle on my sensitive skin. This definitely made my skin feel smoother. I love the refill system and the included pump that makes sure we don't add bacteria to our products! I loved this. I wish it was more affordable so that I could buy it ran I ran out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this water lock moisturizer, it makes my skin very soft, smooth and moisturizing.  It is quickly absorbed, not greasy at all, very hydrating, and loves its citrus taste.  I like this product very much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels SO luxurious. The texture of this product makes it easy to apply on the face for a quick application. I love the sustainable refill system because it means less waste is created when repurchasing this product. This product was complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare is so moisturizing for my dry skin. It also doesn't irritate or break me out since my skin is pretty sensitive. I also like how the scent isn't too strong and it makes my face feel so nourished and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Tata Harper for my honest review.  The cream includes a refill pod that locks into refillable jar. It was designed to avoid contamination. I love the idea. Tata products have high quality ingredients and they never let me down. I have a dry skin and I think this cream is a great moisturiser, perfect for summertime.  I like how smooth it applied and it gave my skin hydration. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_title: It's Making My Forehead Visibly Smoother!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from Tata Harper. I'm impressed because I'm starting to see results already, and I just started using this moisturizer 4 days ago! My forehead tends to be on the dry side, but it's gotten visibly smoother and more moisturized! The packaging is beautiful and luxe; I also like how it's a refillable, reusable system! I've been wearing this under sunscreen and makeup and haven't experienced any pilling. One thing to keep in mind- this moisturizer does have a strong orange scent, so if you have fragrance allergies or sensitivities, this might not be for you. That being said, I have moderate fragrance allergies that might have kept me awake at night after applying this moisturizer but was able to block out the orange scent by applying a little vaporizing rub ointment on my nose!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was gifted by Tata Harper. I love this Water-Lock Moisturizer. My skin feels moisturized and refreshed after I use it. With the water lock, my skin feels rejuvenated and hydrated. this moisturizer smells so fresh and leaves your skin feeling moist all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was received complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare and feels great because of its unique packaging that allows for mess free pumping of the product and feels so smooth. The cream is lightweight and feels good on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG, I’m so happy with the product! The results si amazing… The product was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. I use it in my morning routine and before going to sleep, my skin has noticed the change, it looks more hydrated, fresh and with a glow that it had not had.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is fantastic. From the moment I put it on till the end of the day, my skin feels nourished. Because the lotion's viscosity is light, I was amazed with how long the moisture lasted. The invigorating and refreshing scent is an added benefit. I'm never going to use another moisturizer! It was gifted by Tata Harper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combination skin but love good hydration. I love the airlock pump packaging. Very convenient and hygienic. This cream hydrates and feels very good. Also after you done with the jar you can buy refill. Super convenient! It’s silicone free Ann make my skin very soft and smooth. It works great under makeup! Gifted by Tata Harper Skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from Tata Harper. This water lock moisturizer from Tata Harper is so hydrating and amazing.  My dry skin loves the moisturizer.  My skin feels so soft, hydrating and smooth after using this. The texture is not heavy but very hydrating . This is amazing for both colder and warmer weather.  Love peptides as an ingredient in my skincare. It’s also silicone free. I love that this has a refillable pod . This is a must have moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new moisturizer I received complimentary from Tata Harper brand. I love the quality of their items and this was not an exception. Great hydrating cream in very cute packaging. Doesn’t make my face skin greasy and leaves it all smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Tata harper skincare, great moisturizer, odd texture that I can’t really explain. But I recommend this product it seems great for all skin types. It seems a bit pricey but it works great and if it’s in your budget I’d recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturiser left my skin supple. Did not strip my skin and causing it to be dry. Would recommend if you can afford the product. Will use again for sure as my skin feels rejuvenated. Complimentary from Tara harper skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the all natural and non-toxic aspect of Tata Harper products. The new Water Lock moisturizer has a lightweight texture without silicone. It smoothes your skin, without clogging your pores. I love how fresh it smells, it has citurusy notes. It’s perfect for my combination skin since it’s not oily and lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare to test out. The moisturizer is indeed ver moisturizing and it also feels really nice on my skin! It's nice and cooling and doesn't have a heavy fragrance either. The box packaging is bigger than I expected for the size of the container.

reviews.review_title: This is my new favorite moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great if you have dry sensitive skin that can't handle harsh ingredients. I like that Tata Harper offers a sustainable refill system for the moisturizer (this is lacking with other brands). There's no silicone in this moisturizer, but it definitely makes my skin feel smoother. This was gifted by Tata Harper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe this is good for someone, but not for me. It’s thick, and the scent is STRONG. One of the top ingredients is orange extract, which can be very sensitizing. It was sensitizing for me, and it caused a minor breakout with just one use. Can’t recommend.

reviews.review_title: A smell you don’t want anywhere near your nose
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got past the smell of this product successfully three times before I called it quits. It smells like melting plastic or burning rubber to me. For those that claim it smells like oranges— that was not my experience. The product itself is nothing special. Tata Harper in general is a good example of a product line with prices that are not relative to “results”. If you have a ton of cash to blow on facial care, you are better of with La Mer (consistently high reviews, world wide praise, and results to justify the price) or alternatively, most of the Tatcha product line. Save your money. Save your nose. Look elsewhere or at the very least get a sample first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only received a sample and I’m hooked! It smells divine and it’s an amazing texture. Can’t wait to buy the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan of this product. I layer it on after I a hydration mist and serum which creates a great base for my primer and the then my tinted spf serum. I have kept my glow and makeup intact until 3p but it has been a bit humid here.

reviews.review_title: Has BHAs and AHAs in it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was only able to use this once because I'd rather not use AHAs or BHAs during my pregnancy. However, this did feel amazing and was super moisturizing for my dry skin. The scent is light and refreshing and I love the sustainable packaging + the pump.  For expecting mothers: This product contains Meadowsweet which is a natural BHA (which contains salicylic acid).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and the fragrance and fact it has alcohol is not good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this as points purchase and I’ve purchased the standard size.  Absorbs wonderfully, really great moisturizer … no middle of the day face tightness.  Not greasy … Tata’s scent has in the past made me keep looking.  But after trying other clean high end moisturizers that gave me the mid day tights and super high end creams… la.  Ahhhh.  That felt like a layer of grease that slid my make up to my knees. I decided to suck up the not fab scent and enjoy my smooth hydrated 63 yr old skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. My skin can get overwhelmed by heavy or thick skincare. I’m prone to milia so a lot of anti-aging creams are horrible for me. This works wonders but doesn’t clog my skin. It smooths irritation, smooths dehydration lines, and plumps amazingly well. I love almost everything by Tata Harper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got as a sample in my most recent Sephora order. Sample got me 2 uses. I always review my samples so I know what I want to buy in the future. Yes Tata Harper products are great. But I am a skin care minimalist and this just doesn’t seem worth buying to me. The smell was tolerable and almost a good smell (I’m very sensitive to them) the product is one that a little goes a long way which I love. But it just didn’t make me go omgggg when I put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall opinion: it’s a decent moisturizer but not worth the price.  More detail: this is a night light moisturizer for my combo/oily skin and perfect for the summer, if you have dry skin I don’t think this would be hydrating enough. It does take some time to absorb but does not pill even on top of a multi step skin care routine. It has a floral fragrance that isn’t super strong but I would proceed with caution if you are sensitive to fragrance. Overall it does it’s job and moisturizes but I did not see any additional benefits/ smoothing effects. For this price I need a product to do more. I will finish it up but won’t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been having problems with my previous products. With frequent mask wearing, my skin was more sensitive. Other products would sting. I did not have that problem with this product at all. I also had a problem with dry patches and flaking; not with this product.  I also think it's interesting that I had issues before  with products that had hyaluronic acid leaving my skin drier.This is the first HA product that actually keeps my skin moisturized. It makes me curious about the brand and excited to try other products. I will say a con is that it is a refillable container, so it had to be assembled. It was a little tricky to align it right so that the pump would work properly. I will add that because it contains AHAs and may make skin more sensitive to the sun, I might try a different one of their moisturizers without it next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pass on this product if you don’t like orange smelling anything as the scent is overwhelming at times. Once you get use to it, it’s ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is worth the splurge! I have been using it consistently for over a month now and I have barely made a dent! It really is such a hydrating and nourishing moisturizer, and I love how you can buy the refills once you run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just finished the entire product after using daily 2x/day. Love the dispenser/pump. Love how my skin looks and feels now. But, it doesn’t absorb well into the skin. I could feel it sweating off during a workout even if it had been hours since application. Because of this I am trying another brand before repurchasing. Everything else was excellent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a thin, lightweight moisturizer that for my skin may be better in the humid summer (currently my skin is normal/combination).  It has a light citrus scent (I don’t find it to be strong compared to some other products that are highly scented). Overall it’s a very nice moisturizer with some good ingredients. I’m giving it 4 stars because I haven’t used it long enough to ascertain if the peptides are truly skin smoothing.  I love the packaging, and how the jar was sealed until I was ready to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A nice clean moisturizer. Not quite enough for me. I finished the jar but had to commit to something a bit more thick. I might try again in the summer .. scent is nice > a beautiful citrus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice lightweight moisturizer that packs a punch in the hydration department. It smells citrusy and reminds me of a gel cream hybrid. It soaks in is not greasy plays well with others and doesn’t cause breakouts. I have dry skin and this does a decent job of hydrating the skin and keeps me from feeling dry later in the day. If you don’t like essential oils/fragrance or like a thicker cream this might not be for you. I also wish the refill was a little less expensive than the full kit because it’s only a couple dollar different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product although, it doesn’t pair well with my other skincare products since it starts peeling and I have to wash it off… it has a lot of fragrance too which kind of irritates my skin (not a bad fragrance). Also, the “MACRO hyaluronic acid” situation is a little confusing since recent studies suggest that the bigger the particle HA, the more water it absorbs from your skin, leaving it drier in the long run. In addition when you look at the ingredients it contradicts the MACRO since it’s sodium hyaluronate. I’m definitely not a skincare expert but I do my research from fairly well known experts.

reviews.review_title: Worth every penny! My favorite product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing, not only is it light and moisturizing, but it ACTUALLY makes a difference. I’ve been using this for 7 months, I finally ran out and ordered more... I didn’t have enough product for the 6 days I waited until I had more...and let me tell you, I noticed a difference not using this! If you’re looking for a great moisturizer that is clean and feels heavenly to apply, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is on the drier side, and this makes a perfect daytime moisturizer. It is lightweight yet still provides ample hydration and plays well with makeup. The airless jar packaging is also a huge bonus! It does have a pretty strong orange scent, but I find it dissipates quickly and did not bother my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special but strong scent. I rather spend money on drug store skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this lotion. The price was reasonable for this brand but seems to have the same high quality. The container is nice and easy to use, the scent is subtle, and it is highly moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and needed a daily moisturizer that would hydrate my skin without clogging it or giving me a reaction. This works. This winter, I used it on a daily basis and did not have any issues. It makes my skin glowing. It lasts long, I bought the refill only at the end of winter and this is because I applied generously. I could have been more parsimonious. I love the fact that the refill option makes it eco responsible. This is one my of my favourite Tata Harper product. This is now part of my routine. I finally found a product that gives me a healthy glow, does not clog my pores and no allergic reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was a little skeptical when buying this because of the price, but bot gonna lie, it feels like heaven in your skin, scent is so nice and subtle, my skin feels hydrated and glowy, just feels great. Love the dispenser container where the moisturizer comes in, gives you the perfect amount of product that you need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: sanitary packaging - pump up type of component. I bought it for my dry skin and it didn’t do much - overall it kinda moisturized, but on my drier areas like around my mouth it did little to nothing (i have combination/dry skin). Moisture wouldn’t hold through the day. Orangey smell didn’t bother me much its not overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Strong orange scent, absorbs okay, did nothing for my skin, won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a small sample packet of this and like how amazingly well it absorbed in my skin without leaving residue or oiliness feeling. I had this favorited for a loooong time and finally caved in to purchase the full size thinking it might be a good replacement for my day moisturizer, liking the refill  plastic recyclable friendly packaging and pump-up top. There is a strong orange rind scent. Yes rind. It’s more harsh then a mellow scent I would say but it doesn’t bother me.  After weeks of using this, I haven’t noticed much difference and feels more like a mediocre day moisturizer in-between other moisturizers. And for the price tag I probably likely will not purchase the refill...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im obsessed with this moisturizer!!! It smoothes my skin so much, it feels like a breath of fresh air over my face! Its very light weight and pleasantly scented without being overwhelming. I love the packaging too. I would recommend for combo/oily skin...maybe not for dry skin because it is pretty light weight

reviews.review_title: Product is great, but packaging not so much
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the product and was excited about the sustainable packaging, but the pump only worked for a couple of days (as with many reviewers, it seems).  After that I ended up removing the middle pump portion and just using as a regular jar.  I was concerned, however, that the product might not work if oxidized or whatever and wrote the company to inquire. But it's been a few weeks and no one has responded, which is really shoddy customer service when their product does not work as advertised.  Not sure I will buy again if I don't hear back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently swapped out Tatcha water cream for this [Tatcha actually isn't as clean due to the fragrance] and I love it. Would definitely recommend making the switch - this I find is more hydrating and it may because it does have hyaluronic acid in it. Also love that it's reusable and you can just buy pods to refill!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly just bought this to try it out and was just expecting a hydrating formula the made my skin feel smooth and soft but wow it’s even better than expected. I applied the cream before bed and had a lot of zits but when i woke up they were GONE!!!! I know it was this cream because it was the only thing i used. So anyway i 1000000% recommend and look forward to trying more tata products!!!

reviews.review_title: silicone free moisturizer that makes a difference
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and silicone free were 2 things I was looking for in a moisturizer as I am lucky enough to have both hormonal acne and rosacea. Keeping my skin hydrated has always been a challenge because my skin gets dehydrated very easily but this has truly made a difference. It’s retextured my skin and I can tell after using 2x a day that my skin is retaining moisture longer than with other moisturizers. I can also say that I haven’t gotten any new blemishes in the weeks I’ve been using this. I would say it’s a light to medium weight moisturizer and using 2x a day one pump each time I think this should last me 6-8 weeks at a minimum. One pump is also enough to do my neck. The comments on the smell are confusing to me because it smells pretty unscented to me and I love citrus so I was hoping it would smell more orange-y than it does. I think this is a great staple and while I do wish it cost less I understand why based on the ingredients that it’s priced on the higher side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overhyped product. Not very moisturizing, very strong smell, cheap-ish packaging (Drunk Elephant bottle way better), overpriced, and irritated my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Truly a breath of fresh air in the world of so many moisturizers. Devoid of any harmful ingredients giving you peace of mind, it is very, very, lightly scented (it took a few applications to realize there was even a faint pleasant clean scent) It is incredibly effective at moisturizing with zero heaviness. Price point wise,  it is an investment into your skin, but healthy always comes at a price doesn't it?  In this case you truly get what you pay for which is quality and it's worth the price. The emollients are all natural, do not sit heavily on the skin, and are rapidly and thoroughly absorbed quickly..although I recommend applying fresh out the shower.  My skin felt softer, moisturized, and healthy. I recommend for normal, combo or oily skin types. This may not be enough for really dry or mature skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good for oily skin. Scent is okay but not my favorite, it's a little floral and strong. It is supposed to act as a primer, and I do think it does to some extent, skin looks smoother than with normal moisturizer. Good price for TATA. I think the packaging works well and I didn't have any issues with getting product out - the little pump mechanism works fine for me.   Nice that it is refillable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer. I have sensitive, breakout-prone skin but this moisturizer doesn’t break me out at all. It has a light and silky finish that doesn’t feel heavy or greasy. Some have complained of the scent but I love it. I find it to be very light and citrusy. I use it both the day and night and it makes my skin super soft. I also like the pump dispenser and the fact that the packaging creates less waste. I will def buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a light but super hydrating moisturizer, perfect for warmer weather.  I love the scent - but beware if you are sensitive to strong fragrances as this does take some getting used to.  I used to find Tata Harper products to fragrant but I've come to love them, scent and all.  No clogged pores and the product looks small but actually goes a long way. Worth it and love that the refill is less to purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells really, unbelievably strong to me. It’s not necessarily a bad smell, but it’s strong to the point of overwhelming and I’m usually not sensitive to smells. It works well enough as a moisturizer in the summer, but for my skin in the winter it’s not sufficient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For my skin this works great however I do not use it daily only when my skin is extra dry I will lather some on.  Light scent to it which doesn’t bother me.  Will mostly be used in the dry winter months for sure.

reviews.review_title: Meh. Perfumed and too light for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soooo perfumed. Not offensive - nice citrusy scent that fades after application, but not what I want on my sensitive face. Also, it’s a very light moisturizer, sinks in quickly, but my combo skin is tight and dry by midday. Used for a week in the mornings and it didn’t break me out. Got a sample, won’t purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smelled awful and greasy. Received as a sample. Glad I didn't pay for this. The first thing I noticed was the smell. It's like soured lemons. It's lightweight but looks greasy when you put it on. It doesn't really feel greasy on your skin, but if you put it on and then look at your skin closely in the mirror, it looks like it is sitting on top of your skin. It doesn't seem any better than my Kate Somerville lotion. The smell alone makes this a no go for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I was so impressed with her other products I have tried so far, this one was a bit disappointing. Once I applied it, it just sat on my skin and didn’t absorb at all and just sat there like a thick layer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. My skin tends to be a bit sensitive and will clog very easily. However this moisturizer was lightweight and melted right into my skin beautifully. It left my skin feeling dewy, and not heavy at all. The smell is also beautiful and fresh. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper gifted me the Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer from in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. This product is absolutely a prestige skin care item. It applies easily without leaving any greasy or slick felling behind. It absorbs into the skin quickly leaving a cool, refreshing feeling and providing your skin with extreme moisture. I absolutely will be adding this as my summer daytime Moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great! It has a refreshing scent and isn't heavy sitting on. It leaves me moistureized and great! It comes in the perfect size container and the price point is great!!! I love it!!!! gifted by Tata Harper Skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to by Tata Harper skincare in exchange for my honest review. I have been using it for almost 3 weeks. I have combination skin and it was hydrated quickly without any greasy effect. My skin felt so smooth. Packaging is great too! The only complain that pore reducing effect is disappeared after 30 minutes. So I have to use a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently I received this Water-Lock Moisturizer that Tata Harper gifted me and I have been using it for a while. This moisturizer is silicone-free and refillable which is very environmentally friendly! I have combination skin and both of my cheeks are very dry especially in winter. The natural peptides and hyaluronic acid in this moisturizer really can help to smooth my skin and balance hydration. I love this product! I use it every day and night as my last step of my skin routine. My skin gets better and more moisturized with this product. And I just ordered the refill tonight for later use. Recommend this product to anyone who has combination or dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for an honest review. Great refillable packaging but this product is not for my dry skin! It dried me out and made my face red! The ingredients include orange peel extract and other orange extracts, which are known to sensitize the face and that's what I think happened to my face. This product is so strong for me, it acts like a peel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. Recently I tried out this Water Lock moisturizer with skin smoothing peptides from Tata Harper, and I wanted to share my review with you. I personally have normal/combination skin and I'm always looking for new skincare products to try. This lightweight moisturizer claims to add moisture using water locking technology, is silicone free, and features orange peptides and pomegranate spheres to smooth skin. As far as the use of the product, I felt like it applies really well and does smooth and soften my skin without the use of silicone which is an ingredient I try to avoid. It feels hydrating and I can tell there is orange oil in it because you can smell it. It's a light smell, but honestly it bothers my eyes just a little bit and I'm not sure I'd continue using it for that reason. The other thing about this product is the sustainable use container. You get the initial jar and the refill for the jar in the package when you purchase it, and assemble the product. When you run out, instead of throwing away the whole thing you just buy a new refill pod and recycle the old one. While I think this is a really cool concept, even after watching the video on how to use the product and assemble it mine didn't go together very well. The threads didn't match up and it was hard to assemble the first time. I also don't like the press-down dispenser of this product even though it is supposed to be more hygienic than a jar you dip your fingers into. I just like to stick to pump dispensers or regular containers. Overall this isn't a bad product but I can't really say it's one of my favorites either. I probably wouldn't buy it after this runs out.

I do really like that Tata Harper produces 100% natural and non toxic formulas using as many advanced green technologies as possible. The biggest thing I liked about the packaging was the top, it resembles a mirror so you can use this product wherever you are and still see where to apply it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This lightweight, silicone-free moisturizer has a unique water-locking technology to give your skin balanced hydration. It primes and smoothes the skin with natural peptides and hyaluronic acid. Key Benefits:  Pomegranate Spheres absorb moisture and lock in sustained hydration.  Orange Blossom Peptides support the skin’s natural barrier and aid with water retention and hydration.  Macro Hyaluronic Acid absorbs moisture and provides a soft, hydrated, healthy-looking appearance.  Sugar Carbohydrate Complex binds water to improve hydration and supports the skin’s barrier. My thoughts: My first time this brand and I was very impressed! I have combination, acne-prone skin and it did not irritate it. The texture is luxurious and applies evenly giving my skin a silky feel, even though it’s silicone-free. I absolutely love the scent, which smells like fresh cut flowers with a hint of citrus...SO relaxing! It acts as both a primer AND moisturizer, so no need for multiple products! When applied under makeup I found it to be smoothing and did not pill. It’s packaged within an airless pump jar, so you don’t have to worry about scooping it out. You massage 1 to 2 pumps onto the face and neck, both AM & PM. I appreciate the sustainable refill system that has a unique refillable pod to reduce overall waste. When you run out, you can simply get the refill pod that provides 30 days of use, allowing you to save 11 jars from going into the landfill each year!!! This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging. It’s safe to say I’ve quickly become a fan and can’t wait to see how it benefits my skin with continued use.
