reviews.review_text: I received this Tata Harper Water-lock Moisturizer complimentary from Tata Harper. Love the packaging and that it comes from natural sources. Loved that this moisturizer was not greasy or stick. This moisturizer made my skin soft. It made my skin feel so hydrated. Smells amazing. Love everything about this product. Will buy more when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This is a stunning moisturizer that is super smoothing & gives your skin a big drink of hydration! It plays well under both tinted moisturizer as well as medium to full coverage foundation. Doesn’t leave me greasy or oily throughout the day. The sustainable packaging really knocks it out of the park. I love that I have an extremely sanitary container with a push pump & that I’m able to just buy a refillable cup to add in once I run out. This is an a+ from Tata Harper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. My skin feels amazing after using this product after only 2 days! This product is silicone free and my skin has never felt smoother than it does now. Im super impressed with the packaging as well. You can purchase replacement pods of product to reduce waste. I feel like that's very innovative! The amount of product is crazy too! Theres so much! Im very happy with this cream and i will definently be buying replacement

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This cream is perfect for my combination  skin. I tend to need extra moisture on my cheeks and neck. This made my face instantly feel smoother and softer. My makeup went on easily after too and my fine lines weren’t as visible. I really enjoyed the light scent as well. I think it’s a great environmentally friendly idea to have the product be refillable. The pump dispenses the perfect amount of cream to cover my entire face. I love that by having a pump it keeps the cream fresher too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good moisturizer, lightweight yet powerful. My dry skin looks and feels refreshed after using it. The citrus cent is calming without being overpowering. It works nice directly under makeup, so you can skip one step (primer) in your routine. I like the idea of being a refillable container - less packaging in future purchases. But at the same time I feel that the price difference between just the refill or the full container should be bigger. Anyway, I would definitely buy the refill anyway, even if it were the same price. Overall, this feels pretty luxurious without  breaking the bank. I’m a fan. I had a bit of trouble getting used to the pump in the package, but after some uses it got better. The first couple of uses I got either too much or too little product with each pump. But I like the pump jar since it keeps the product inside, less susceptible to contamination since you don’t have to scoop the product from inside the jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I absolutely loooove this moisturizer. It smells great and is silicone free so u get the smoothing/silky feel on your skin but without junk ingredients that actually harm your skin. It's also perfect for under makeup and also nighttime moisturizer after serums. So so good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. this product is absolutely amazing. best product i’ve received so far. and it’s actually full size. the moisturizer feels great and isn’t heavy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.  First of all, I really like the sustainable refill system. It makes it so that you create less plastic waste because the only thing you're replacing is the single pod inside. The moisturizer itself is a nice cream where a little bit goes a long way. I felt the moisturizing effects right away, but I would have to say that this is probably better during the dryer months as it's pretty humid here right now and this can feel too heavy due to the excess moisture in the air. I think this will be perfect for the winter months though. I also love that this is a natural beauty brand and product. I kind of wish the scent wasn't as strong, but that's just a personal preference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light texture of this moisturizer and the fact it is a refillable system as well. I don’t think this is something I could use in winter since I don’t find it hydrating enough in that aspect. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and has such a luxe smell to the cream. This is def a summer only product for me!   [I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.]

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I loved that this is refillable.  The packaging was easy to ensemble and keeps the product fresh and clean.  This left my skin dewy, but soaked in.  I applied my tinted moisturizer over the top leaving my skin smooth and protected without looking over done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I absolutely love this water lock moisturizer. It goes on so smooth without any stickiness. I’ve been using it for about a week now and i have noticed a huge difference in my skin. It has left my skin feeling so smooth and moisturized. I will definitely purchase more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.This is a great product, It goes on easily, absorbers quickly, has a pleasant scent to it and the dispenser is pretty neat to.  I think the Water Lock Moisturizer is suitable for all skin types. It left my skin feeling super hydrated and moisturized.I Highly recommend trying the Tata Water-Lock Moisturizer, your face will thank you.

reviews.review_title: I love my Tata Harper Water-Lock Moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This product is absolutely amazing. For starters the packaging is incredible! As soon as you open the box you can just tell the quality is going to be amazing. I love that the product container is reusable and refillable! The Water-Lock Moisturizer itself is amazing! It feels so good on your skin. It leaves my skin feeling soft and refreshed. This is by far the best Moisturizer that I've ever used. I will continue to buy and use this product daily. I highly recommend this product! Ive already convinced my mom to order one online!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. The product is super moisturizing on my skin. I also love how environmentally friendly the packaging is. Instead of throwing the product away when empty, you just buy refills. I will definitely recommend this to friends, the only issue I'd say is the price point. It is pretty expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tata Harper Water-lock moisturizer! It is amazing luxurious vegan cream. This product contains a refillable jar, a reffil, a pump, and a cap. Everything is very easy to assemble. I highly support the idea of refillable/reusable products. It is such an appropriate time to care about our environment. Packaging is high-quality and nice.  The moisturizer is lightweight, breathable, and silky. Has a light natural citrus scent, but not overpowering. I use a small amount of the cream and it works wonderfull. Absorbs quickly,  and leaves my skin refreshed and deeply hydrated. My skin looks moisturized and smoother. Definitely would recommend it.  I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This product felt super nice on my face! It is super hydrating. The packaging is also great! I love how eco friendly it is for the environment! The only issue is the cost. Though it is eco friendly, it is also fairly expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I am very impressed with this moisturizer! It feels great and absorbs into my skin quickly. I have oily skin, and this product worked well for me, as it was light weight. I really like the sustainable refill system because it’s more environmentally friendly, and the refills are a little bit cheaper, so you’re also saving some money.  I was a huge fan of the silicon free smoothing effect and my skin felt smooth and soft. Finally, I thought wearing this moisturizer under makeup helped make it last longer throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare, but these are my honest thoughts! So far, I have really enjoyed this moisturizer. The texture is light and it goes onto my skin very smoothly. The peptides included in the formulation make my skin look smooth and my pores look smaller as well. The scent is light, and not unpleasant. As this product has an AHA in it, it's absolutely vital to use a sunscreen with this to decrease photosensitivity. It blends well with sunscreen and doesn't pill when other products are applied over it.   The idea of a refillable pod is very interesting, and something I've never seen before. When assembling, be sure to remove the foil from the pod containing the product, then to snap just the pod into the bottom of the cap first before screwing the cap and pump onto the external jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Tata Harper skincare. Really loved how it leaves you with smoother skin it’s lighter so you won’t end up feeling sticky or heavy afterwards. The best part is it’s organic so you don’t have to worry before putting it on you skin!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.   When I read the words moisture lock! I knew this would be the moisturizer I was looking for. My skin is “Sahara desert dry”... I’m always looking for moisturizers that can complement my skin.  Once I finished washing my face, I put this on. It’s feels really nice on the skin, not tacky or anything which is what I look for in a moisturizer. And the best part? It does last! I usually carry a mini version of my moisturizer around because my skin is so dry that I have to reapply so I don’t get dry patches during the day! And this works! What I also like is that you can refill it, specially since this is will be a staple in my skin care routine I like to be able to refill this.  My skin felt smoother and plumper, and did not interfere with my foundation which is a plus. It isn’t oily either! Love love love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing moisturizer. I've been looking for something to replace the neutrogena hydroboost for a while because its filled with chemicals and sillicones and thats why it gives your skin the appearance of being hydrated- but this is incredible and i dont feel bad about putting it on my skin after cleansing/exfoliating. it makes my skin plump and hydrated and even though i think its free of bad fragrances, it smells great. my only negative is that its a bit difficult to put together the packaging at first. other than that its an incredible moisturizer.   I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I love this NEW Water Lock moisturizer by Tata Harper skincare to hydrate the outer layer of skin. It has a nice thickness, fragrance, and it keeps my skin feeling moist all day. I love that it is a primer-moisturizer combo. Works incredible under makeup and has a great natural scent. I love the contamination free and sustainable packaging. Each pod is good enough for 30 days use. Massage 1 to 2 pumps onto the face and neck. Use AM & PM. When you run out, get the refill pod. I love that they are 100% natural and non-toxic. I love it and will be buying more in future!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I am a black woman that suffers from acne due to dryness. My skin always want to overly compensate my lack of moisture with oil. My first impression was OMG, I love the packaging and how it prevents contamination. Also the sustainable refill system is simply genius! I typically do a lot of research on a products sustainably missions and Tata Harper meets it! I followed my normal skincare routine, but added the Water-Lock Moisturizer before adding my skin oil and OMG what a difference! I always thought that I was using my oil products wrong, but I think this product has taught me that my products simply don't have enough moisture built in. I really love this product, but I really don't like the smell of citrus, so that is honestly the only deal breaker for me. Depending on how great my skin does over the next month, I may just have to learn to love the smell because the product feels amazing! It has also looks fantastic under my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal skin and never used a moisturizer like this one before. The Water-Lock Mosturizer from Tata Harper is very lightweight and it works great before applying make up. I also loved the moisturizer container - amazing design that does not allow contamination from your skin to the product and it is sustainable (since you can buy the refill). I really feel my skin smoother.  I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. I have many skin concerns like I have a very dull, uneven texture, rough and dry skin. Since I am using a TATA water -lock Moisturiser I can see a big difference on my skin.  This lightweight water-locking technology delivers a sustained dose of hydration,  boosting water retention, while pomegranate spheres and macro hyaluronic acid absorb moisture to provide sustained hydration. I can feel my skin is breathable now.  Just take 1–2 pumps and massage onto the face and neck, and then apply sunscreen. And you are good to go! The packaging is also very pretty and phenomenal.Tata Harper Skincare is a highly effective product. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. My 1st impression of it is that I love how silky it feels when I applied it to my skin. It doesn't feel heavy at all and is not greasy. I like the packaging as well and that it has a pump to pump out just the amount you need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels so nice on my skin. I love that is has a refillable system. Makes it nice for the environment. My skin felt smoother than it normally does. It’s a decent size too. I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. Let me just say i love the pumping mechanism along with concept of the refill pod. I have normal skin and this seems light and hydrating enough on my skin. i also like how its cruelty free, clean and not overly fragrant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. Love this moisturizer! It’s formula is smooth, lightweight and easy to apply. It absorbs quickly and my skin feels refreshing, smooth and hydrated without making it oily or dry. The scene is fresh and amazing and I love that’s eco friendly. The packaging is so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare.  Firstly, I absolutely love the sanitary airless pump and refillable pod - this is a great way to get many uses out of the gorgeous glass green jar! I break out from silicones so I was thrilled to try this moisturizer, and so far my skin loves it.  It's definitely very smoothing and worked great as a hydrating base for my makeup with no pilling! I can see this working for me both in the morning and evening.  This is a cream that would be perfect for both oily and dry skins, and is perfect for the acne prone like me since it's silicone free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was complimentary from Tara Harper and is a phenomenal product! It’s so dewy and gives me a great new glow. I love that it is eco friendly. It smells like luxurious orange blossoms and is so amazing. I can’t wait to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I felt it was a nice moisturizer; but I’ve tried better especially for the price. Feels nice and clean and absorbs well. What really turned me off is the price of the ‘refill’ - a mere $5 less for a plastic cup reminiscent of childhood jello versus a new luxurious glass package. I am all for the system of a reusable component and refill - but this system is not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In 24 hours this transformed my skin. I’m obsessed with this brand

reviews.review_title: love the packaging but ok product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging! Super easy to assemble and use the dispenser. It’s very hygienic and fresh because it comes sealed, so love that and wish more brands would do the same for their packaging. It’s also more environmentally friendly because you can just buy the refill after. But the moisturizer itself still left my skin a bit dry even though it looked like a good consistency. Overall it’s average for the price if you don’t have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Based on the sample only, found it super sticky and a bit stingy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does Not Layer Well! As another reviewer also described, this does not seep into skin and layer well at all. My biggest pet peeve with moisturizers. No matter what or do or how long I wait before applying sunscreen or makeup, it peels off. No thanks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this moisturizer okay, mostly I love the way it smells like orange blossoms, but the dispensing jar it comes in is trash.  It has this dumb complicated dispenser that supposedly keeps your filthy fingers from contaminating your moisturizer, but mine stopped working so I just keep the jar unscrewed so it’s probably going to get all oxidized or whatever.  The tata harper stuff ive gotten in the past felt luxurious partly because of the beautiful green glass jars, and now this feels incredibly overpriced for a non-functional jar.  Might as well just get the refill pod.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overhyped and not worth the price. Literally didn’t notice any difference in my skin. 2 stars because I feel it’s slightly above a 1 star rating that I save for catastrophes. But for the price, what it does vs what it claims to do? Not worth it. I’ll be going back to drunk elephant!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Review is based on free sample received for a 2-day use. Surprisingly, I really enjoyed this moisturizer, especially Sephora sends me tons to try. This one was surprisingly refreshing. I like to layer different products (your regular serums and etc), and this final step is light weight and gentle on my sensitive skin, and easy for me to apply oil and sunscreen afterwards. It locks the moisturizer for me, and I’m purchasing the full size to give it a long term try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer I have ever used and I’ve tried everything you can think of. It feels so amazing immediately when applied to the skin and provides long lasting serious hydration which is a huge task for my dry eczema prone skin esp when I’m stuck wearing a surgical mask for 12+ hours a shift working as a RN during the pandemic. Work dries me out period from the hospitals airway circulation to not having enough time to take water breaks so the mask all but kills my skin. This has saved it literally. I can’t even say enough good things about it. It’s a must if you have dry skin!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a trial size, and fell in LOVE!!! It is so light and refreshing, yet still delivers so much long lasting moisture. Will definitely be buying the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to like this so bad, but it just doesn’t hit. Smell is amazing, goes on luxuriously smooth, but after one minute it’s gone. I have dry-combo skin and want to feel like my moisturiser has me covered. Also was not a fan of discovering it had AHAs (via Tata Harper website) and not meant for wear in the daytime/sun, which wasn’t disclosed here. For a nighttime moisturiser this is way too light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer smells sooo good but left my skin feeling super tacky and almost over-hydrated. I would imagine it might be different for someone with dry skin, but I didn't love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and loved it ! It made my skin glow and was not too oily . Can’t wait to order the full size !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! This cream made my face feel smooth and hydrated! I got this as a sample from Sephora and was surprised how decent it was. The moisturizer I feel dissolves into the skin nicely without leaving any grease or dryness. It leaves the skin hydrated all day long. I wasn’t a fan of the smell and the price point is a little over my budget, but if it weren’t I would buy jars and jars of this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the price... I didn’t notice much of a difference if any on my skin and the fragrance it quite strong. I wasn’t a fan of the orange scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing - like fresh oranges!  I found this to moisturize well and to work well under my SPF and make-up.  It feels very refreshing and makes me smile every time I put it on.  I also love knowing this product does not have any toxic ingredients.  Great work Tata Harper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Felt really nice at application. It isn’t too thick, soaked into skin well. Felt clean and not greasy. It has a subtle/clean/citrus scent. But after a week of using it my skin was dry and breaking out. I try not to hold breaking out against products bc that isn’t always the products fault, it could just be unique to my skin BUT a moisturizer that steals moisture and dries skin out is just WeirD.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t layer well with other products. I couldn’t use my vitamin c in the morning without this peeling. I tried it without the vitamin c, & it didn’t work well with my sunscreen. I don’t see myself using this as I wished. I will have to use it on my neck perhaps since this doesn’t layer well. I also think my skin didn’t react too well from it. It wasn’t irritated, but it wasn’t supple and smooth like it usually is. Very lightweight, but I’m said it’s not a winner fir me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My review is only based on a 2-day use since I received a sample (hence 4 stars since I can't really comment long-term), but I really like it! It's very light and feels great on my skin. It absorbs into the skin quickly.  Initially, I didn't love the scent, but it grew on me. It's not very strong and it doesn't linger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Tata Harper and I love this product! Been breaking out on my chin lately, and since I started using this product, it’s been clearing up - skin is moisturized but also able to breathe! Layers well with other products, and smells wonderful. Excited to see the refill pods and know that not only can I save on future product, but help out the environment with less packaging as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this moisturizer! The smell is heavenly and it feels so luxurious on my face. A little goes a long way. I love that it’s a reusable/refillable product. Also love that it has an airlift pump so you don’t have to touch the product when you use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is really hydrating, absorbs quickly and smells like oranges. My only qualm is that it left a slight tight feeling on my face. Now I had no serums or other skin care underneath so maybe it won’t do that when paired with other things but it was definitely noteworthy. Having your skin ever so slightly tight isn’t always a bad thing anyways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my oily combo skin, this product is not hydrating and actually leaves my skin feeling more dry. The product dries leaving a thin layer on my face so every time I raise my eyebrows I can feel it almost cracking. It also burns my eyes if I get it in them. If you have drier sensitive skin I am not sure I would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never write reviews but this moisturizer is a must. Deeply hydrating and glow inducing, equivalent to splashing your face with water. Hasn't broken me out or irritated me with anything reactions. The smell is gorgeous. Pro tip: Apply some on your lips , then seal it with lip balm. Packaging is well thought out and sustainable. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin on the T zone but dehydrated cheeks and this moisturizer is an absolute skin saver addressing those two issues and making my skin stay so smooth all day. It also smells heavenly. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! Has a natural orange smell to it, it’s a light smell but is so good! Super hydrating and soaks quickly into the skin and leaves your face so soft and refreshed. Great ingredients in this. Bonus the packaging is awesome! Super easy to assemble, just pop the refill container in and twist the lid on. Easy. Pump one two pumps and your good to go. The fact that it’s refillable and you can look whenever you like to see how much you have left is amazing!!! Great product all the way around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is incredible. Leaves your skin feeling super hydrated and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating and absorbs quickly. The container is difficult to assemble and the pump is not very good which is disappointing given the price tag. Great moisturizer, terrible packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this moisturizer on a whim. The description and the fact that the packaging is refillable we’re all a plus. WARNING: once you use it, you’ll never want to use anything else. Tata Harper hit a home run with this formula. The texture is sublime. It absorbes and leaves your skin hydrated but not oily. This is a truly modern approach to skin care. It feels great knowing that you can take care of your skin with a luxurious product, from a brand that cares about the planet. A win win on my book!

reviews.review_title: My dry sensitive skin loves it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you're a fan of DE Protini I think you'll love this as well. The two are very similar in both texture and finish. I would say this moisturizer is slightly more hydrating and I find I need to use very little product which is great. This does have a citrus scent but I don't find it overpowering and the smell fades immediately after application. I LOVE the packaging and the fact that its refillable - major props to Tata Harper for this! I did experience pilling one time but I would attribute it to user error since I haven't had issues since. I can't speak to its priming benefits as I haven't worn makeup recently but I find moisturizer is the best primer for dry skin so I would imagine it works great (for reference I have dry sensitive skin)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this straight from tatas website when it got released. What a gem!!! This is perfection for me. It’s silky, lightweight, breathable and truly locks in moisture. No greasy feeling, no tackiness and not heavy. I seal my essence with this and wake up with soft hydrated skin. Smells like orange blossoms. One star deducted for the price. For people that break out from dimethicone and coconut alkanes, this is the solution!
